content: {"name": "Regional Day School", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Summer meal program\nCoordinator: Shirley\tTaylor\t2014136921\t\nStart: 07/01/2025\tEnd: 07/30/2025", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "425 Johnston Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Bergen-Lafayette", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07304", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7156305, "longitude": -74.0619973}, "phones": [{"number": "(201) 946-6629", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:45", "closes_at": "13:15"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:45", "closes_at": "13:15"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:45", "closes_at": "13:15"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:45", "closes_at": "13:15"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:45", "closes_at": "13:15"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:45", "closes_at": "16:45"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:45", "closes_at": "16:45"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:45", "closes_at": "16:45"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:45", "closes_at": "16:45"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:45", "closes_at": "16:45"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Meals must be eaten on site."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "All children under 18 are eligible"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Student Meal Site"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Summer Meal Program"}]}
